Tool

NamePolygon Shape Indices
ID7
Author(c) 2008 by O.Conrad

Description

Various indices describing the shape of polygons. Based on area, perimeter, maximum distance between the vertices of a polygon. - Interior Edge Ratio (Perimeter / Area) - Shape Index (Perimeter / (2 * SquareRoot(PI * Area)) References: Lang, S., Blaschke, T. (2007): Landschaftsanalyse mit GIS. Forman, R.T.T., Godron, M. (1986): Landscape Ecology. Cambridge.
